name: CryptoTicker
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This will allow you to add crypto currencies to your flash briefing such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Xrp, Bitcoin Cash, EOS, Stellar, Litecoin, Cardano, Tether, Monero, Tron, Iota, Dash, Binance Coin, NEO, Ethereum Classic, NEM, Tezos, ZCash, Vechain, mMaker, OmiseGO, Bitcoin Gold, 0x, and Dogecoin
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
